channel.title: Time Series on Dario Arcos-Díaz, PhD
channel.description: Recent content in Time Series on Dario Arcos-Díaz, PhD

item.title: Fitbit activity and sleep data: a time-series analysis with Generalized Additive Models
item.description: This is a time-series analysis of activity and sleep data from a fitbit user throughout a year. I use this data to predict an additional year of the life of the user using Generalized Additive Models.

item.title: Visualizing parallel event series in Python
item.description: In this post, I will use Python to visualize two different series of events, plotting them on top of each other to gain insights from time series data.
